meta.source_provenance: Email from noreply-public@digital-policing.co.uk to Ben Carter on 2024-11-14 (issued on behalf of PC Jonathan Dixon, Sussex Police)

emails.subject_summary: Jonathan Dixon requires your assistance in a police investigation
emails.body_raw:
You have been requested by Jonathan Dixon, a Police Officer or member of Police Staff, to provide data to assist with a police investigation/enquiry.
Please click here to respond to this request. The link will expire on 28/11/2024.
emails.body: Evidence-portal request sent to Ben Carter via Digital Policing, issued on behalf of PC Jonathan Dixon, Sussex Police.

sentence_tags.text: The link to the request will expire on 28/11/2024.
sentence_tags.notes: Sets a new expiry date of 28 November 2024, one day later than prior requests.

contradiction_links.claim: Police provided a consistent and stable evidence intake deadline.
contradiction_links.reality: Deadline was shifted forward to 28/11/2024, suggesting prior request timing was not fixed or clear.

events: Digital Policing portal request issued on behalf of PC Jonathan Dixon (case 47240214305).
Deadline for evidence submission set for 28/11/2024.

damages_summary.emotional: Stress caused by repeated shifting deadlines.
damages_summary.strategic: Moving deadline may cause confusion about compliance window.
damages_summary.reputational: Multiple reminders could be misconstrued as lack of cooperation.
